name: 4 Lines
description:
Game for Apple OS X 10.10+

Complicated tick-tack-toe game is made for those who got tired of the classic version.

The players draw coloured sides of cells in course - each player has his own colour for a game. The purpose of each player is to draw the 4th side of a cell (close it) and put a mark inside the cell (each player has his own mark). You should play attentively - you shouldn't let your opponent close the cell and put his mark inside it

Special features:

-game against computer

-game against your friend on one screen

-large variety of levels

minimum requirements:

OS X 10.10+
